environment_variables.PROGRAM: train_t2i_adapter.py     --pretrained_model_name_or_path=$MODEL_DIR     --pretrained_vae_model_name_or_path=madebyollin/sdxl-vae-fp16-fix     --output_dir=$OUTPUT_DIR     --mixed_precision=fp16     --resolution=1024     --learning_rate=1e-5     --max_train_steps=50000     --max_train_samples=3000000     --dataloader_num_workers=8     --validation_image=/admin/home/suraj/code/muse-experiments/ctrlnet/masked-images      --validation_prompt 'a man sitting on the bench' 'a tiger sitting on a bench' 'a dog in a park'     --train_shards_path_or_url='pipe:aws s3 cp s3://muse-datasets/laion-aesthetic6plus-min512-data/{00000..01210}.tar -'     --proportion_empty_prompts=0.1     --validation_steps=500     --train_batch_size=16     --gradient_checkpointing     --use_8bit_adam     --enable_xformers_memory_efficient_attention     --gradient_accumulation_steps=1     --seed=42     --report_to=wandb     --resume_from_checkpoint=latest     --push_to_hub     --checkpoints_total_limit=5     --use_euler --use_non_uniform_timesteps --adapter_in_channels=4 --control_type=mask
